content:
Leben lives at $3^{\text{rd}}$ Avenue and $1^{\text{st}}$ Street, represented by the point $(3,1)$ on the map below.  Her school is located at $5^{\text{th}}$ Avenue and $8^{\text{th}}$ Street, represented by $(5, 8)$ on the map.  To get to school, she walks over to $5^{\text{th}}$ Avenue and up to $8^{\text{th}}$ Street.

**Plot Leben's home and her school on the map.**

[[☃ interactive-graph 1]] 

**How far does Leben walk to get to school?**  
[[☃ input-number 1]] blocks
